document_data.name: Snow Snake
document_data.level2e: {{spell table|edition=2e|[[Cleric]]|5|[[Combat sphere|Combat]]|5|[[Elemental sphere|Elemental]]|5|[[Elemental water sphere|Elemental water]]|5}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snow snake''''' was a multi-[[school of magic|school]] [[divine]] spell that briefly conjured a serpentine being made of snow.
document_data.Effects:
This spell could only be cast if there was a significant volume of snow near the casting [[cleric]]. If this snow was produced by the spells ''[[ice storm]]'' or ''[[cone of cold]]'', it enhanced the capabilities of the ''snow snake''.
 
When cast, the ''snow snake'' appeared and struck at any beings that were hostile to the cleric. It came crashing down in a massive dome-shaped blast.

The ''snow snake'' could be briefly ridden by the caster, but only for a short distance.
document_data.History: This was spell was contained within the [[Auril]]ian [[relic]], the ''[[Silver Supplicant]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a number of [[material component]]s, including a mass of snow twice the size of the caster and a single teardrop, drop of water or spit.
